name: Dog Game
description:
This is a short game that the two of us made in our free time over the summer. You play as Sir Kibble, daring dog-venturer, as he explores a dungeon in search of treats and treasure! All assets were hand made by us from scratch.

Both of us are college students who are practicing to get into game development, and this was our first project.

Please enjoy and let us know what you liked in the comments!

Controls:

Arrow Keys or WASD - Move and Jump

Z - Attack

X - Block

C - Interact

Credits:

Rane Squires - Programming, Art and Music Consultation

Evan Squires - Art, Music, Programming Consultation

Updates:

v1 -- Game Launch

v1.1 -- Fixed an audio bug on retry

v1.2 -- Fixed a small screen transition bug
